item.title: Choosing a Hosting Partner
item.description: <img src="/media/Server_Linux.jpg" alt="Image via Wikipedia" /> <figcaption> <p> Image via Wikipedia </p> </figcaption> No question about it, choosing a good hosting partner is one of the most important decisions a CTO / CIO can make, especially in a .com company. I recently had to choose a hosting partner for the new portero.com. Since the space changes so rapidly the last provider you used may no longer be the best fit for you now.
